{{Bot|Mr. Ibrahem}}
* [[Commons:Bots/Requests/Mr.Ibrahembot]]

== Bot purpose ==
This bot adds missing, appropriate categories to Our World in Data (OWID) files uploaded via the OWID importer tool and currently categorized in [[:Category:Uploaded by OWID importer tool]].

== Scope ==
The bot will only edit files in [[:Category:Uploaded by OWID importer tool]].

== Bot tasks ==
* Add country-level categories for OWID graph files under [[:Category:Our World in Data graphs by country]].
* Add continent-level categories for OWID map files under [[:Category:Our World in Data maps by continent]].

== Notes ==
* The bot only adds categories (no removals or other metadata changes).
* Files for which the country/continent cannot be determined will be skipped.
